atomica.logic
Class MoleculeDetector

java.lang.Object
  atomica.logic.MoleculeDetector

public class MoleculeDetector
extends java.lang.Object

The class is responsible for detecting all Molecules in a game situation.

Author:
Georg Ludewig

          Keeps all detected Molecules.

Method Detail

detectMaxSizeMolecule

private void detectMaxSizeMolecule(Molecule m)
Tries to detect a bigger Molecule than the given m. This method will be called recursively for each found Molecule.

Parameters:
m - the initial Molecule from where to start to detect a bigger one.

detectMolecule

private void detectMolecule(AtomToken startAtom)
Detects the Molecule with maximum size the Atom is involved in.

If the Atom is not already used by another Molecule the scan algorithm starts. It first tries to build a 2*2 Molecule. If that's successful it recursively tries to grow. The scan direction is only east and south, as the MoleculeDetector scans the whole game situation.

Parameters:
startAtom - the atom where to start the Molecule detection

detectMoleculeEast

private Molecule detectMoleculeEast(Molecule m)
Tries to detect a Molecule with a bigger size than the given m in east direction.

Parameters:
m - the initial Molecule from where to start to detect a bigger one.
Returns:
the Molecule with a bigger size (if found)

detectMolecules

public java.util.ArrayList<Molecule> detectMolecules()
Scans the whole game situation for Molecules and returns them in an ArrayList.

Returns:
a list of all detected Molecules

detectMoleculeSouth

private Molecule detectMoleculeSouth(Molecule m)
Tries to detect a Molecule with a bigger size than the given m in south direction.

Parameters:
m - the initial Molecule from where to start to detect a bigger one.
Returns:
the Molecule with a bigger size (if found)

detectMoleculeSquare

private Molecule detectMoleculeSquare(Molecule mEast,
                                      Molecule mSouth)
Scans the square, where mEast defines the columns and mSouth the rows. A valid Molecule must have Atoms at all that Fields.

Parameters:
mEast - the Molecule defining the columns
mSouth - the Molecule defining the rows
Returns:
the Molecule in the given area. if non exist: null.

detectSimpleMolecule

private Molecule detectSimpleMolecule(AtomToken startAtom)
Starts scanning at the given startAtom for a Molecule with 2*2 size.

Parameters:
startAtom - the Atom where to start the Molecule detection
Returns:
the Molecule which includes the startAtom with the size of 2*2 Atoms

isUsed

private boolean isUsed(AtomToken atom)
Checks whether the Atom is already in use by a Molecule or still available by looping through all detected Molecules.

Parameters:
atom - the atom to check
Returns:
true if not used, false if used by a molecule
